name: Halloween Blitz
description:
“Halloween Blitz” is a game for all ages and for all occasions!

Can be played alone or with friends, on the road or on a party – now “Halloween Blitz” is always there when you need it! This game play for up to 4 players

The game rules are very simple and are great for kids as well!

Players accumulate points by being the first to grab the correct cards.
At the end of the game, the player with the most points wins!
